# MySqlDateTime.GetDateTime method

Returns a DateTime value (if [`IsValidDateTime`](../IsValidDateTime/) is `true`), or throws a [`MySqlConversionException`](../../MySqlConversionExceptionType/).

```csharp
public DateTime GetDateTime()
```
